to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: For you Ubuntu fans:
body:
UBUNTU PLANS MOBILE LINUX VERSION 

Ubuntu Linux developers plan to extend its open source software
development to handheld Internet-enabled devices. 
http://newsletter.infoworld.com/t?ctl=1766A19:D47C41E26B9B88BD1C96D0B0B0
ED52F5EFF29049075316B4
  

and the printer friendly version can be read at: 
http://www.infoworld.com/archives/emailPrint.jsp?R=printThis&A=/article/
07/05/07/ubuntu-mobile-linux_1.html
  

So for those of you who want an open source accessible PDA, here is your
chance to get in on the ground floor. 

Steve Dawes 
Phone: (403) 268-5527 
Email: SDawes@calgary.ca
